attributes.action: Get Rid of England Matches on Setanta and back to BskyB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all pay for our Sky Sports perscription to watch Live Fotball matches. However Setanta has now got the England away matches, which you have to pay extra for! What we need is for Setanta to sell the rights for the Away matches either back to sky or to ITV so everyone has the right to watch them instead of having to pay extra.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with The Football Association.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
